text: Norman Kirk in 1974. This is a summary of the electoral history of Norman Kirk, Prime Minister of New Zealand (1972–74), Leader of the Labour Party (1965–74), Member of Parliament for Lyttelton (1957–69) and later Sydenham (1969–74). ==Parliamentary elections== ===1954 election=== ===1957 election=== ===1960 election=== ===1963 election=== ===1966 election=== ===1969 election=== ===1972 election=== ==Local elections== ===1953 Kaiapoi mayoral election=== ===1956 Kaiapoi mayoral election=== ==Leadership elections== ===1963 Deputy-leadership election=== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size: 95%;" |- style="background-color:#E9E9E9" !
